title: Melissa Brown on Smart Beta ETFs (Audio)
itunes:title: Melissa Brown on Smart Beta ETFs (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Melissa Brown, Senior Director of Applied Research at Axioma, on their "buyer beware" research on smart beta ETFs.
